name: Wild Oasis
description: A user-facing website for Wild Oasis hotel, created with Next Js and designed for users to book our beautiful cabins as they wish!

name: Wild Oasis Dashboard
description: A React application for Wild Oasis hotel management built with React Query and Supabase

name: Natours
description: A website designed with SASS to help people discover different parts of the world by our popular tours and a way for our clients to meet the nature

name: Nexter
description: At Nexter, your satisfaction is our priority. We are committed to providing a seamless and enjoyable experience as you embark on your journey to find the perfect property.

name: My Resturant
description: Welcome to My Restaurant—your fast food online hub! Enjoy juicy burgers, crispy fries, and quick delivery right to your door!

name: Fast React Pizza
description: Welcome to Fast React Pizza—your go-to app for fast pizza delivery! Enjoy a variety of mouthwatering pizzas, all just a tap away, with speedy delivery right to your door!
